name: Trip To Zoo: Animal Zoo Game
name_original: Trip To Zoo: Animal Zoo Game
description:
It’s time for animal zoo trip for kids!! It will be super fun and you can play all animal games. Get ready for this fun and survival zoo trip.

Age between 3-8 is the best time for children to begin discovering the interesting world around them, it’s our job to help them and letting them know about zoo animals that what they eat? how they sounds? where they live? etc.

To let them learn, let's take them to very famous jungle safari zoo in city.

This animal zoo game called "Trip to zoo : Animal Zoo Game“ brief idea of various animals in a zoo. The game introduces various animals to the child like, elephants, horse, birds, dolphins and many others.

Kids Trip To Zoo is all in one zoo game for kids! Your kid will learn about various zoo animals and practice them with various kid games. Child will learn what the animals eat? and how to fix a broken fence? This knowledge is acquired by performing actions in the right order, such as arranging a fence or washing and feeding animals.

Your Child can perform following activities inside the zoo game :

- Start with packing a bag of items for zoo trip (eg. Camera, Water bottle, Football etc).
- Dressing up with trip clothes. Don’t forget to take a hat.
- Get a ticket for the animal zoo.
- Show and put all the wild animals in their right paddock or terrarium.
- Now you can perform different activities with various animals.
- Clean up cages and residences.
- Feed to hungry seals and play with seals.
- Make fences around the paddocks.
- Put birds into their right cages.
- Animals are hungry, feed them well. Some of them are very dirty, give proper bath and feel them fresh.

The game has been designed to teach cause and effect. It tests your child’s senses through pictures, sounds and touch.

If there is any issue or suggestions about game, don't hesitate to write to us because we will more than happy to hear from you!!
